name: Keyword search (live)
description: Searching for keywords over the raw data in a case without using an index of text content
details: This may be done on a physical sector basis, or on a logical (file) basis.
references: NIST, 2025. Computer forensics tools & techniques catalog: string search, https://toolcatalog.nist.gov/taxonomy/index.php?ff_id=31
X-Ways (2025), X-Ways Manual: Simultaneous Search (section 5.10), https://www.x-ways.net/winhex/manual.pdf
X-Ways (2025), X-Ways Manual: Logical Search (section 5.11), https://www.x-ways.net/winhex/manual.pdf
